attributes.action: allow dog owners to get updates on their police seized dogs with pictures
attributes.additional_details: the government should enforce a rule that the kennel either gives you a unique code for a website that you can put in and see if your dog is eating or if they have any issues a bit like a diary for them or they should send it in a no reply text. this way the owner bothers the police less for updates and they have piece of mind for their loved ones
attributes.background: when dogs are seized by police the officers are very lack with information they share normally you only get updated when something happens. this is wrong owners should be able to see picture updates of their dogs and their wellbeing e.g if their eating well

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
The communications between the police and the owners of seized dogs are the responsibility of the Police, not the UK Government or Parliament.
